mapper.sql: t_house_asset_complaint . id , t_house_asset_complaint.user_id AS userId, t_house_asset_complaint.old_user_id AS oldUserId, t_house_asset_complaint.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_asset_complaint.clash_certificate AS clashCertificate, t_house_asset_complaint.clash_describe AS clashDescribe, t_house_asset_complaint.solve_status AS solveStatus, t_house_asset_complaint.create_time AS createTime, t_house_asset_complaint.solve_time AS solveTime
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_asset_complaint.* FROM t_house_asset_complaint WHERE t_house_asset_complaint.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_asset_complaint.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_asset_complaint
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_asset_complaint.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.old_user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.oldUserId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.assetId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.clash_certificate LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.clashCertificate},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.clash_describe LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.clashDescribe},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.solve_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.solveStatus},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.solve_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.solveTime},'%')
AND t_house_asset_complaint.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_asset_complaint.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT t_house_asset_complaint.*,t_house_asset.id AS assetId,t_house_property_community.community,t_house_property_building.`code`,t_house_asset.number,t_end_user.avatar,t_end_user.phone,t_end_user.`name`
FROM t_house_asset_complaint LEFT JOIN t_end_user ON t_house_asset_complaint.user_id = t_end_user.id LEFT JOIN t_house_asset ON t_house_asset_complaint.asset_id = t_house_asset.id JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building.id = t_house_asset.building_id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_building.community_id = t_house_property_community.id

AND t_house_asset_complaint.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
